players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "'I believe we should focus on finding the mafia among us. Given the sudden death of Diana, it's crucial that we work together to identify and vote out any suspicious individuals.'..."
Bob: "I agree with Charlie that we need to focus on finding the mafia. I have no information about last night, but I will support any investigation or vote that seems logical based on the evidence."
Charlie: "Based on the evidence we have, it appears that Alice is the mafioso. I urge everyone to vote for Alice in tonight's vote."
You: "I have nothing to hide and no reason to harm Diana. I believe we should keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before making any accusations or votes."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
